title: CAR MODEL VARIANT detail page Â» CAR MODEL
user_story:
As a visitor\
I want to know the CAR MODEL to which each CAR MODEL VARIANT belongs\
So I can quickly find other variants of that model
description:
* The CAR MODEL VARIANT detail page is extended to contain a section for the connected CAR MODEL.
* The CAR MODEL is presented with its name and primary information.
* The CAR MODEL contains a link to its detail page.
* The CAR MODEL has a thumbnail image.
* When there is no CAR MODEL connected to the CAR MODEL VARIANT then the section is not displayed at all.
